post.body: Who says I'm "not so drunk"? But I'm glad to hear you're here for me, my friend. ;^)
Go, RoNee! Yell about your bulge to the entire Twitter world. Don't hold back. lmao };-)
you're the one that brought this fine piece of cinemetography in to your home. U @ least had a reprieve during a twooping session.
There's some flooding at the corner of Henderson & Tumwater Blvd. My truck & I went for a swim this morning.
What do you mean so early? It's 10:45, sleepyhead. Time to get up & go for a ride in the slush.
What kind of med induces migraines? I'm a better living through RX kind of girl. Sounds like I'll have to steer clear of that one.
Am I the only one who went there with that tweet? };-)
Thanks @HeatFan. ;-P U know how badly I was wanting to share that w/everyone on Twitter. Ur in such deep s#%t, my friend. lmao
Disaster Movie is a horrible movie, but I keep watching & laughing. It's phuckng disgusting.
Five more minutes & I'm outtee here. I'm so done with sitting behind a desk today. Ready to run & play now!
My friend's kids scored cell phone's w/unlimited texting for xmas. Totally think it's sweet they msg'd me to let me know. ;-)
Since I'm here all alone for another 2 hrs, I might as well crank the tunes and do a little bit of work.
Aced the BSA exam. In compliance for another year now. Can I go home now?
OMG, BSA education course is sooooo boring. Can I claw my eyes out and rip the hair from my skull now?
Woo-hoo! Just completed the mandatory sexual harrassment course at work. ;-P
Have a migraine hangover today. Feels like my skull was used like a set of bongos. I'm a little cranky & resenting being at work. ;-P
Pounding a glass of cold water while recovering from a migraine is apparently a bad move. Pain level just shot up immensely.
Yes, I understand.
down where Master?
Thank you @itradio & @HeatFan. ;^)
